chinese: 农历新年伊始
pinyin: nóng lì xīn yán ī shǐ
translation: Agricultural New Year Begins

breakdown.meaning: Traditional Lunar Calendar (农 = farmer, 历 = calendar/record)
New Year (新 = new, 年 = year)

chinese: 美国三天掉了四架飞机
pinyin: Měiguó sān tiān diào le sìzhī fēichéi
translation: In three days, four planes were dropped by the United States.

breakdown.meaning: United States (美 = beautiful, 国 = country)
three days (三 = three, 天 = day)
four planes/structures (四 = four, 架 = frame)

chinese: 美国X热搜第一下是‘WTF IS GONING ON’，通俗点翻译就是 ***这是啥情况
pinyin: Méigóu X hot search 第一下是“WTF is going on”，通俗点翻译就是 ***(这个部分可能涉及敏感信息，用星号代替)
translation: In the U.S., 'X热搜第一下' is at number 1, with the phrase 'WTF IS GONING ON', which translates to ***What's going on?***

breakdown.meaning: the United States (美 = beautiful/civilized, 国 = country)
X热搜（这里的X是一个流行文化现象，代表未知或神秘的含义）
the first place (第一 = first, 下 = down/position)
“WTF”是一种常见的网络用语，通常表示对某事感到困惑或不解。它起源于英语中的“what the fuck”，意为“你他妈是什么情况？”
（这是一个英文短语，通常用于表达对某种事情的不解或疑问。Here's what is going on.）
（这里可能是指某些不适合公开的内容，用星号代替。通常翻译为“What's going on？”或“What is happening?”）

chinese: 这个词条下群魔乱舞
pinyin: Zhègě cìbiǎo xià qūmó l腕 wǔ
translation: These contents lead to chaos.

breakdown.meaning: under/cause (下 = down/below, 但有时用于引起或导致的意思)
chaos/dancing of demons/monster (群 = group, 魔 = devil, 乱 = chaos, 舞 = dance)

chinese: 既有自由派在唉声叹气诅咒特朗普
pinyin: Jiūyóu zìdà zài huā shēng sāo qì tuò qǔ Tǎng Mǎn
translation: Some liberals are lamenting and cursing Trump.

breakdown.meaning: have, also (既 = have; 也是 = also)

chinese: 又有MAGA在手舞足蹈说驱逐非法移民这事做对了嘿
pinyin: yóu yǒu MAGA zài shǒu wù shàn shuō qū jìng fàn zǐ zhè shì zuò duì le hǐ
translation: There's MAGA, doing foot movements while saying they've done a good job driving away illegal immigrants.

breakdown.meaning: Make America Great Again (often used as an acronym for this phrase)
to dance with hands and feet (形容做一些轻微的动作)

breakdown.pinyin: qū jìng fàn zǐ zhè shì
breakdown.meaning: the act of expelling illegal immigrants (驱逐非法移民：驱逐=驱赶，非法移民=非法的移民)

chinese: X上还有一条正火热的新闻
pinyin: X shàng zài yǒu一条 zhèng huǒ wēi de xīwén
translation: It's a big news event.

breakdown.meaning: On X (X = specific platform or service)
Big news event (正 = big, 火 = hot/warm, 热 = heat)

chinese: UCLA的中国留学生刘丽君因为参加支持巴勒斯坦人民集会被吊销签证驱逐出境
pinyin: (Zhōngguó) Liú Rìjūn yòng shǒujī xuéxí, qǐyà zǒu zhī gǎowù.
translation: A Chinese student from UCLA was deported after her visa was revoked for participating in a support rally for Palestinian people.

breakdown.pinyin: (Zhōngguó) Liú Rìjūn yòng shǒujī xuéxí, qǐyà zǒu zhī gǎowù.
breakdown.meaning: University of California Los Angeles (UCLA); Chinese student Liu Lijun was deported after her visa was revoked for participating in a pro-Palestinian rally.
Chinese students at UCLA; specifically, Liu Lijun.

breakdown.character: 因为参加支持巴勒斯坦人民集会
breakdown.meaning: Because she participated in a rally supporting Palestinian people.

breakdown.pinyin: Běi lógōn qīzhèng qūjí de chéngxu
breakdown.meaning: Her visa was revoked, leading to her deportation from China.

chinese: 我认识一位UCLA毕业生。
pinyin: Wǒ rènshi yì bǐ UCLA graduat
translation: I know one UCLA graduate.

breakdown.meaning: University of California Los Angeles (缩写)

chinese: 在美国加州工作的哥们
pinyin: Zài Měìlǐ Jiāzhōu zuò de Gémen
translation: The guys working in California, USA.

breakdown.meaning: buddies (colloquial term for friends or colleagues)

chinese: 他也支持巴勒斯坦
pinyin: Tā yě bùzhù Bālèsān
translation: He also supports Palestine.

breakdown.meaning: Palestine (巴 = Bale, 乐 = Sela, 斯 = Sal, 兰 = Rana)

chinese: 立场上偏自由派
pinyin: lìjiànshàng piān zìyóu fēi自由派
translation: His political stance leans toward liberal思想.

breakdown.meaning: political stance, position (立 = stance, 间 = between)
in the context of political stance, often used to indicate a higher or specific level of stance.
liberal faction, people who advocate for freedom and progress.

chinese: 但是不投民主党和共和党
pinyin: Dàn shì bù tóu Mínzhǔdǎo hé Gāngchǎo
translation: However, he does not vote for the Democratic Party or the Republican Party.

breakdown.meaning: Democratic Party (民 = people, 主 = master)
Republican Party (公 = public, 共 = mutual)

chinese: 对政治不感兴趣
pinyin: Duì zhèngchí bù gǎn xìng qù
translation: I don't feel interested in politics.

chinese: 刚好在线
pinyin: Gāng hǎo zài lián
translation: Just in time online.

breakdown.meaning: just now, only (刚 = just, 好 = good)
good, well, just in time (好 = good, also can mean 'in time')
online, connected (在 = to be, 线 = line/ connection)

chinese: 借着刘丽君这事我问他怎么看
pinyin: Jiè zhaǐ Liú Lìjūn shé shì wǒ yòu tā nǎ lǐ kàn
translation: I asked him how he views this matter, using Liu Lijun's case as an example.

breakdown.meaning: to borrow; to use as an opportunity
how he views; how he looks at

chinese: 他回复我说
pinyin: Tā huífù wǒ shuō
translation: He replied to me.

breakdown.meaning: reply (回 = to return; 复 = complicated)

chinese: 他们准备要回国了
pinyin: tāmen zhǒngyào yào guó lǐ le
translation: They are preparing to return home.

breakdown.meaning: they, them (他 = he, 她 = she, 它们 = they)
to prepare, to make ready (准备 = preparation, 要 = intention)
want, intend to do (要 = want, intend)
to return home, go back to the country (国 = country, 回 = back)
a particle indicating completion or result (了 = finished, done)

chinese: 出国研究生读书后接着在美国工作快二十年了
pinyin: Chūguó yánzuǐshēng dú shū hòu jièsī yī Měikuān gōngzuǒ kuài èr shí nián le
translation: After completing his studies abroad, he worked in the United States for nearly two decades.

breakdown.meaning: undergraduate student, graduate student (研 = research, 生 = life)

breakdown.character: 接着在美国工作快二十年了
breakdown.pinyin: jièsī yī Měikuān gōngzuǒ kuài èr shí nián le
breakdown.meaning: subsequently worked in the United States for nearly two decades

chinese: 但是今年初以来
pinyin: hǎn sìncǐ hǎo dàiyǐ
translation: But since the beginning of this year, things have changed a lot.

breakdown.meaning: but (连接语，表示对比或反驳)
this year at the beginning (年 = year, 初 = early/initial)
since then (自 = since, 以来 = from that time onwards)

chinese: 各种事弄得他心烦意乱
pinyin: Qūzhōng shì nòng de tā xīn fàn yì luán
translation: A variety of things bother him and make his mind confused.

breakdown.meaning: various, different kinds (各 = each, 种 = kind)
to handle, to manage, to get (弄 = to arrange)

chinese: 加州大火虽然没烧到他家
pinyin: Jiǎshǒu dàhuǐ suìrán méi sháo dào tā jiā.
translation: Although the wildfire didn't burn down his house.

breakdown.meaning: state; part of 加州 meaning California

chinese: 但是保险公司涨了保费
pinyin: dànshì bǎoxǔ zēngle baóféi
translation: But the insurance company has increased its premiums.

breakdown.meaning: insurance company (保 = to guarantee,险 = insurance)
premiums (保 = to guarantee, 费 = cost)

chinese: 他们的社区还按人头摊派专门出一笔钱赞助当地的消防队。
pinyin: hóngmén de chéshì yǒu hái nǐrén tóu pàidīng zhuānmǎnchūyībǎnkùai zànzhìjiàngdéxiaojiu qū.
translation: Their community is still distributing money dedicated to local firefighting teams based on the number of people.

breakdown.meaning: community (community, composed of '社会' = society and '己' = self/own)
still/also; used to indicate actions that are still ongoing or in addition.
based on the number of people (按照 = according to, 人 = person, 头 = head/count)
to distribute/assign (派 = assign/distribute, 散 = spread out)
specifically to set aside a sum of money (专门 = specifically, 出 = take out, 一笔 = one sum, 钱 = money)
to support the local firefighting team (赞助 = support, 当地 = local, 消防队 = fire department)

chinese: 驱逐非法移民导致市面上临时工稀缺修草坪都找不到老墨了
pinyin: Quānzhǔ fàn fā qūmín yīn qǐ shìjiē shàng línshí gōng jǐ huán xiàn cǎo fang lù hóu le
translation: The expulsion of illegal immigrants has led to a shortage of temporary workers on the market, making it difficult to find 'old墨' to mow lawns.

breakdown.character: 导致市面上临时工稀缺
breakdown.pinyin: Yīn qǐ shìjiē shàng línshí gōng jǐ huán
breakdown.meaning: Leading to a shortage of temporary workers on the market

breakdown.character: 修草坪都找不到老墨了
breakdown.pinyin: Xiū cǎo fang lù hóu le
breakdown.meaning: Finding 'old墨' to mow lawns has become difficult

chinese: 加州物价飞涨都没停过
pinyin: Jiāzhōu shǒugè fēi zàn dū méi tiān guò
translation: In California, prices have been soaring without stopping.

chinese: 特别是特朗普断掉NIM资金这事
pinyin: Tèlǎngpǔ dǎodī NIMA jīzīn gònghuà shìjiàn
translation: Especially, Trump has cut off funding for the NIM program this matter.

breakdown.meaning: to cut off (断 = to break off/stop, 除 = exclude)
National Institute of Mental Health (美国国防高级研究计划局，简称NIM，中文：美国国家精神健康研究所）

chinese: 成了压倒他内心防线的最后一根稻草
pinyin: Chéng le yī suǒ tā nèi xīn fáng liú de huò zǐ zhǎn cǎo
translation: It became the final straw that overwhelmed his inner defenses.

breakdown.meaning: became/turned into (成 = to become, 了 = aspect particle)
to overwhelm, suppress (压 = to press, 倒 = down/over)
inner defense/defense mechanism (内 = inside, 心 = heart/mind, 防 = to protect, 线 = line/rule)
the final straw (last = 最, 一 = one, 根 = root, 草 = grass/crop)

chinese: 他跟我说
pinyin: Tā kù wǒ shuō
translation: He tells me

breakdown.meaning: he, him (由三个笔画组成：左，右，上)
to follow, to accompany (由'走'加上'足'而成)
I, me (由五个笔画组成：人，王，口，心，力)
to say, to speak (由'舌'和'口'而成)

chinese: 回国后可能先去某高校落脚
pinyin: huíguó hòu bĕi xiān qù某gāo xüè luò jiū
translation: Upon returning home, he might first go to a top university and settle there.

breakdown.meaning: After returning home (回 = return, 国 = country/upon)
May/might first go to (某 = some, 去 = go)
A top university (高 = high, 学 = school/academy)
To settle/camp (落 = to fall,脚 = foot/ground)

chinese: 他持有的技术专利本来就准备在国内落地
pinyin: tā chǐyǒu de jiùsuǒ lì bǎn shou yì zài guójiā llà dìng。
translation: The technologies he holds have always been intended for domestic application.

breakdown.meaning: patent for technology (专 = expert/field, 利 = benefit)
to implement domestically (国内 = within China)

chinese: 特朗普当政期间说不定还会限制
pinyin: Tèlǎngpǔ dāngzhèng期间 shuō bùdìng hálì cìxū.
translation: During Trump's political tenure, he might still impose restrictions.

breakdown.meaning: Trump (usually refers to the former U.S. president)
During Trump's tenure in office; a period of political activity.
Still will; might still impose restrictions.

chinese: 现在干脆肉身脱美算了
pinyin: Xiànzài gǎnsuì ròushēn tuōměi suǒ le
translation: Now, let's just cut to the chase and get it over with.

breakdown.meaning: now, these days (今 = today, 昨 = yesterday)
decisively, suddenly (干 = strong, 突 = sudden)
physical transformation or change in appearance
enough, it's enough (算 = to calculate, 乐 = happy)

chinese: 他说至少在他的周围圈子里
pinyin: Tā shuí bùguó zài hīs qūāngcí lǐ.
translation: He said at least in his circle of acquaintances.

breakdown.meaning: at least (不 = not, 瓜 = at least)
his circle of acquaintances (他的 = his, 周围 = around, 圈子 = group/cluster, 里 = within)

chinese: 找回国的路子已经蔚然成风了
pinyin: Zhǎo huí guó de lùzi yǐ jīng chén rán xìng fēng le
translation: Methods to return to the country have become increasingly popular.

breakdown.meaning: particle indicating possession or association with the preceding noun (的 = of/for)
way(s), method(s) (路 = path, 子 = child/descendant; collectively refers to ways or methods)
already (已 = already, 经 = through/after); indicates that the action has occurred or is in progress
has become quite common/popular (蔚 = quite, 然 = phenomenon; together means to have become increasingly popular)
particle indicating completion or termination of the action described by the preceding verb (了 = finished/terminated)

chinese: 他感觉美国的风向实在不对劲
pinyin: Tā gǎn Y_meìlà dé fēng xiàng yī jīan bù duō qiang
translation: He feels that America's direction is not correct.

breakdown.meaning: the direction/trend in America (美国 = United States, 风 = wind, 向 = direction)
not correct, misguided (实在 = really, 不 = not, 对 = to, 劲 = strong)

chinese: 对于MAGA
pinyin: duì Mā Gē
translation: Regarding MAGA

breakdown.meaning: An acronym commonly used to refer to 'Make America Great Again' (often associated with political movements or slogans)

chinese: 他以前是冷感
pinyin: tā yǐqian shì lěng qūan
translation: He was cold before.

chinese: 国之将亡
pinyin: Guózhījiàng mìng
translation: The nation faces ruin.

breakdown.meaning: will be about to do, is going to

chinese: 必有妖孽
pinyin: bì yǒu yào nüe
translation: There must be something wrong.

breakdown.meaning: supposedly beautiful or charming woman (妖 = supposed beautiful woman)
